ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] ugh, shutting bards out of lotto getting more widespread
ygData.msgSnippet: dunno, get all the bards together and boycott the guild don t let them have any help from you at all after a couple of miserable fights, they might change
ygData.messageBody:
dunno, get all the bards together and boycott the guild
don't let them have any help from you at all
after a couple of miserable fights, they might change their mind

just a though, I'm the only Primary Character Bard in my guild, so I don't
know how this will work

MacGrough Mich'Rathe
Solusek Ro Wanderers

----- Original Message -----
From: "Jeff Heskett" <tarkin@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 10:08 PM
Subject: [eqbards] ugh, shutting bards out of lotto getting more widespread


> tonight i found out that no longer will bards in our guild be allowed on
> lotto for haste items, ever. (unless it's bard-only)
>
> 2 cloak of flames dropped off nagafen last time (i wasn't there or i
> would've known about this sooner) and bards were excluded in the lotto.
no
> more runed bolster belts will be going to bards either. (fbss only likely
> one now, and only then if no other guild members that need it are in group
> according to guild rules)
>
> i need some pursuasive arguments to back me up. this is a guild of 150+
> different players. (tho minus a few bards lately)
>
> i tried a few arguments mentioned on this list, but the leaders of the
guild
> are pretty sure that since bards have haste songs, they don't need a haste
> item. (even tho they stack) being a huge guild, the leaders get whines
and
> rants all the time, so our chances of convincing them otherwise is very
> slim.
>
> any ideas?
>
>
